article_title: Brooklyn Man Released From Prison After Murder Conviction Dismissed
article_text:
A man who spent the past 24 years in prison walked out of court a free man Tuesday after Brooklyn District Attorney Kenneth Thompson agreed to dismiss his murder conviction following a re-investigation by his office.

When a Brooklyn Supreme Court judge vacated Jonathan Fleming's conviction, the 51-year-old bowed his head and appeared frozen for...
